The Ansar and the people of Madinah prayed towards Bayt al-Maqdis for approximately two years before the arrival of the Prophet ﷺ to them. The Prophet ﷺ prayed towards the Kaaba in Makkah for eight years until he was taken on the Night Journey to Bayt al-Maqdis, then he turned towards the Kaaba.
